code: @Test public void testDirect() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:foo").expectedMessageCount(3).     template.sendBody("seda:start", "Hello World").     // now create 1000 other endpoints to cause the first direct endpoint to vanish from the LRUCache     for (int i = 0. i < 1200. i++) {         context.getEndpoint("direct:bar-" + i).     }     template.sendBody("direct:foo", "Bye Moon").     template.sendBody("seda:start", "Bye World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("seda:start").to("direct:foo").     from("direct:foo").to("log:foo").to("mock:foo"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("seda:start").to("direct:foo").             from("direct:foo").to("log:foo").to("mock:foo").         }     }. }
